sentence: Warnock is set to battle former University of Georgia football star Herschel Walker, who has Trumps backing, while Abrams looks likely to face Kemp in a rematch of the 2018 gubernatorial election.
author: Rachel Scully
title: What time do polls close in Georgia, Texas?

sentence: In the race for Senate in Georgia, former football star Herschel Walker is expected to win the Republican primary, despite allegations of past violent behavior with women.
author: Isabel Martins
title: Primary Election Results for Georgia, Texas, Alabama and Other States

sentence: In the Georgia U.S. Senate race, former NFL star Herschel Walker, who is backed by Trump, is expected to handily win, setting up a showdown with current Democratic Sen. Raphael Warnock.
author: Clyde Hughes
title: Georgia governor, Senate races highlight primaries in 5 states
